Brāhmaṇo pana attano kuhakatāya evampi bhagavati dhammavassaṃ vassite visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Kevalamassa āyatiṃ nibbānatthāya vāsanābhāgiyāya ca sabbā purimapacchimakathā ahosīti.
Iti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
Soṇadaṇḍasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
